summary.description:
Whole-degradome-based Plant MicroRNA-Target Interaction Analysis Server.

If you use WPMIAS, please cite this article: Yuhan Fei, Yiyang Mao, Chengji Shen, Rui Wang, Hongsheng Zhang, Ji Huang, "WPMIAS: Whole-degradome-based Plant MicroRNA-Target Interaction Analysis Server", Bioinformatics, 2019, in press. DOI:10.1093/bioinformatics/btz820
summary.name: WPMIAS
